classitems.description: Keeps the api prototype static, we only need one copy.
Uses the PHP backend to request a JSON that will have 10 recipes based on the search terms.

classitems.description: Displays the ingredients that the user added to the text area.

classitems.description: Checks whether or not the given ingredient was already inputted.
classitems.name: checkIngredient

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the ingredient to check.

return.description: `true` if the ingredient **`name`** has been inputted by the user. Returns `false` otherwise.
